title: Quarterly Access Review
description: A security analyst initiates the quarterly access review process, requiring managers to certify their direct reports' access rights.

tasks.description: Generate access reports for each employee and send them to their respective managers for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully generates and distributes the access reports.

tasks.description: Track the managers' responses and send reminders for incomplete reviews.
Receive a manager's request to revoke access to a specific application for one of their employees. Process the revocation request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst receives the access change request and successfully removes the unnecessary permission.
